rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.description: This open-plan space integrates the entrance hall with a spacious living room, featuring Mediterranean style detailing, large windows for natural light and views, and is positioned to align with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Mediterranean Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Mediterranean kitchen with island counters and natural stone backsplash. The kitchen is oriented to the east for morning light while incorporating Vastu principles in its layout.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony. Designed to ensure privacy and Vastu-compliant placement (north direction recommended). Features Mediterranean aesthetics with decorative moldings.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom positioned in a quiet corner of the ground floor, ensuring adherence to Vastu guidelines for health and well-being. Mediterranean design elements are subtly incorporated.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed with ample natural light and Mediterranean accents. Its placement respects Vastu principles by ensuring a productive environment.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large entrance door with sidelights and transom windows to let in plenty of natural light. Designed as per Vastu guidelines, ensuring positive energy flow.

openings.name: Window - Living Room
openings.description: Large window providing an unobstructed view and ample sunlight. Vastu compliant to balance light and air circulation.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Entrance
openings.description: Access point from the ground floor leading directly to the swimming pool area, with Mediterranean stone finishes.

openings.name: Home Theater Door
openings.description: Direct access to a dedicated home theater space in the basement or attached room. The layout respects Vastu principles by keeping entertainment areas away from sleeping quarters.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Balanced bedroom ensuring sufficient space and privacy. Designed with Mediterranean finishes and Vastu compliance for peaceful sleep.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with built-in storage. Its orientation is carefully chosen to align with Vastu guidelines for harmony.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom designed to be functional and adhere to Vastu principles. The fixtures are chosen for ease of use.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated home theater with acoustic treatments and comfortable seating. Its placement on the first floor ensures minimal disturbance to other living spaces, following Vastu guidelines for entertainment.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Interior staircase connecting the ground floor and first floor. The placement respects Vastu guidelines by ensuring a clear path for energy flow.

openings.name: Window - Bedrooms
openings.description: Windows in bedrooms to allow natural light, aligning with both Mediterranean style and Vastu principles.
